---
title: "Representació de dades"
output: html_representacio-dades
---

Cargar dades adolescent
```{r}
dataset <- read_delim("../jobs/table-adolescent.csv",";", escape_double = FALSE, col_types = cols(`mesos ingrés` = col_double()),trim_ws = TRUE)
```

Cargar llibreries
```{r}
library(plotly)
library(plyr)
```


Barplot Gènere Adolescents
```{r}
counts <- count(dataset,"GènereID")
counts$GènereID<-c("Masculí","Femení")
counts$text<-counts$freq
data <- data.frame(x,y)
p1 <- plot_ly(counts,x = ~x, y = ~y, 
  text = y, textposition = 'auto',
  name = "SF Zoo",
  type = "bar",
  marker = list(color = 'rgb(158,202,225)',
  line = list(color = 'rgb(8,48,107)', width = 1.5)))%>%
  layout(title = "Gènere Adolescents",
         xaxis = list(title = "Gènere"),
         yaxis = list(title = "Nombre"))

```

Barplot Nacionalitat

counts <- count(dataset,"NacioID")
x<-c("Espanyola","Països Àrabs","Països de l'Est","No definit")
